project.name: Games
project.author: Chris Gianelloni
project.description: The Games project manages the games-* categories in Portage.
project.longdescription: The Games project manages all games that are added into the Portage tree. We're the guys that put the fun into Gentoo. We also manage a few utilites that are used heavily in many games, such as the SDL* libraries.
project.goals: The games project aims to turn Gentoo into the premiere Linux gaming platform. We strive to have the best compatability not only for free games, but also for commercial titles.

body.p: If you want to get involved with improving Gentoo's gaming experience, we'd like to hear from you! The main thing you'll want to do is be active on Gentoo's Bugzilla. Also please join games project members in #gentoo-games on irc.freenode.net.
